alert.note: Alert for Fountain; Parke; Vermillion; Warren (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 29 at 11:42AM EST until February 03 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Illinois... Wabash River from Lafayette to Vincennes. .Lowland flooding continues along the Wabash River from Lafayette to Riverton, and will arrive at Vincennes Tuesday night. The crest is currently at Covington. Flooding is expected to continue along the lower Wabash at Riverton and Vincennes well into next week. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Covington. * WHEN...Until early Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Lanes to river residences west of South River Road south of Covington flooded. Sandhill Road at Mud Run just northeast of Covington begins to flood. Extensive lowland flooding in progress. Higher bottomlands flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 AM EST Monday the stage was 21.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:45 AM EST Monday was 21.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 21.9 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued late tonight by around 245 AM EST /145 AM CST/.
